node.info: Unlike IQ, which computers have, and EQ, which exists in higher mammals, SQ is uniquely human and, the authors argue, the most fundamental of the three. It is linked to humanity’s need for meaning, an issue very much at the forefront of of people’s minds as the century draws to a close. SQ is what we use to develop our longing and capacity for meaning, vision and value…
node.name: Spiritual Intelligence: The Ultimate Intelligence
node.author: by Danah Zohar
